p: Germacrene-D is an organic compound belonging to the class sesquiterpenoid germacrane. The sesquiterpene hydrocarbon germacrene has five isomers, i.e., Germacrene A, B, C, D, and E. Germacrene D possesses antibacterial properties [ 122, 123]. This sesquiterpene is present in several of the EOs studied, among which we can mention EOs of A. gratissima, L. camara, L. montevidensis, L. alba.
